page.title: 04Landscape in Little Sodbury.
page.content: Little Sodbury is a quiet place.It has a very nice landscape,there are no shops or factories although,there is one primary school at nearby Horton, and one telephone box.The landscape is mostly hills and trees.The houses in the landscape are mainly old and they blend into the landscape.There are very few new houses,so instead the old houses are being renovated.The woodland in the area has quite a bit of wildlife,mostly birds.The fields are mostly for grazing animals.This is because the clay soil in the Little Sodbury area is very suitable for growing grass.There are some crops of wheat and barley.On Chipping Sodbury Common is the golf course.Model aircraft flying has been banned from the Common,because there has been a lot of trouble from the aircraft, disturbing the cattle.
